summary: This is a mod that replaces the Skyrim fonts.
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Arial][b][u][/u][/b][/font][/center][center][font=Arial][b][u][size=6]RaniKSE's Easy-To-Read Font Replacer[/size]
[/u][/b][/font][/center]This is a mod that replaces the Skyrim default fonts to easy-to-read fonts without taking the immersion out of reading books, letters, and quests. In the future, I am going to make more custom fonts for Skyrim, (e.g, Skyrim UI, Start menu, subtitles...), so stay tuned.

[b]Replaceable Fonts[/b]
[list]
[*]Books
[*]Letters
[/list]
author: RaniKSE
